title: Reading Comprehension Improvement Program Through Group Scribble Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Text Comprehension Skills and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Utilization of collaborative digital whiteboard tools in online environments to facilitate interactive group work

learning_goals: Learners can read texts from various social domains and summarize key content with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can visually organize ideas generated during collaborative processes with peers using group scribble tools.
Learners can perform text inference at least three times based on questions posed in collaborative discussions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
